epd_metadata.address: Anillo Perif. Nte., San Juan de Ocotán, Zapopan, Jalisco, Mexico
epd_metadata.program_operator_address: 11670 W Sunset Blvd., Los Angeles, CA

product_description.company_description: Holcim Mexico produces and markets cement, ready-mix concrete, and other products and services for construction.
product_description.product_scope: This EPD covers ready mix concrete products produced by Holcim México Operaciones, S.A. de C.V. at their Zapopan (KZAZ) Concrete Plant facility.

lca_information.study_goal: The intended application of this life cycle assessment (LCA) is to comply with the procedures for creating a Type III environmental product declaration (EPD) and publish the EPD for public review.
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: ISO 14044:2006 requires the LCA model to contain a minimum of 95% of the total inflows (mass and energy).
lca_information.data_sources_and_quality: Primary data from Holcim México Operaciones, S.A. de C.V. for the year 2020. Background data from ecoinvent v3.6.

transport_and_installation.raw_material_transport: A combination of actual mode/distance combinations were assumed for key bulk materials.
transport_and_installation.electricity: Electricity generation and consumption values were based on monthly utility bills.

additional_info.regulated_substances: No regulated substances of very high concern are utilized on site.
